subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The Royals have not made the postseason since winning the World Series in 1985, but a group of promising young players has fans hopeful as Kansas City prepares to host the All-Star Game.
snippet: The Royals have not made the postseason since winning the World Series in 1985, but a group of promising young players has fans hopeful as Kansas City prepares to host the All-Star Game.
